title: Back projection fixed in gazebo5 still occurs in gazebo7

content.html:
I fixed back projection problem in gazebo2 and gazebo5. #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2152/fix-remove-back-projection/diff#comment-None #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2201/fix-remove-back-projection/diff

But it occurs again in gazebo7 as seen in the picture below:

As far as I see the history of commits in gazebo7 branch, my previous pull request is not yet applied. #!/osrf/gazebo/history-node/a29d8dabed9a/gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc?at=gazebo7_7.0.0

Is there any chance to apply it to gazebo7 so all kinetic users (using gazebo7 by default) can use fixed version?

FYI, my pull request is applied to the default branch. #!/osrf/gazebo/history-node/25df4fb10d33/gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc?at=default
